This project is a full-stack Skill Swap Platform. Frontend: React + Vite + Tailwind CSS + MUI. Backend: Node.js + Express + Prisma (SQLite). JWT authentication, Cloudinary for image uploads. Prioritize user flows, admin features, and demo experience.
